==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(After completing [[The Strange Tale of Suikou's Tipsy Tincture]])
:'''Kousaka:''' Seriously, though, what are these "fan novel" things?
:'''Kousaka:''' Every time I ask the people around here, I get dirty looks. What's with that?
:'''Kousaka:''' Also, I've been listening to the discussions between people in the queues, and while I recognize every word they say, the sentences that are formed make no sense to me...
{{Dialogue End}}
